/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a car, giving a driver's eye view of the urban landscape. The sky above is a clear blue, suggesting a bright and sunny day. The buildings lining the street are tall and modern, their facades painted in shades of white and gray, reflecting the city's contemporary architectural style. Cars and buses fill the street, indicating a busy time of day. The image is taken from a low angle, which emphasizes the height of the buildings and gives a sense of being in the midst of the action.
